transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Very good afternoon sir.
Customer: Very good afternoon boliye.
Executive: Abhimanyu Singh baat kar raha hu sir senior manager IndiaMART se sir.
Customer: Haan ek minute haan IndiaMART.
Executive: Bilkul sir.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello haan ji sir Vinayak ji se baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Haan bol rahi hai.
Customer: Ji sir aapka concern aaya hua hai IndiaMART mein aap se bataenge sir kya issue aa raha hai sir aapko.
Customer: Hame na local onboard virtual representative yaha pe chahiye because kya hota hai ki aap log aap log kya karte ho waha se aapka Delhi ya aapka north side se phone aa jata hai fir hum logo ko time nahi rehta hai aap batate ho ki ye settings karo wo settings karo usme kya hota hai buylead purchase karne se pehle wo lapse ho jati hai aur isme kaafi saari dikkat hoti hai to agar local koi banda rahega to wo hame aake fatafat usko help karega.
Executive: Kyuki humko hum logo ne na aapka portal leke uska utilization nahi ho raha hai hamare taraf se.
Customer: Aapke side se portal ka utilize hi nahi ho pa raha hai.
Executive: Haan kyuki hame clear nahi ho pa raha hai.
Customer: Kyuki pehle aate the aapke yaha se local log lekin abhi
Executive: Ye sab pehle aate the.
Customer: Main bata raha hu sir.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Pehle sir aapko jaate the aapke yaha pe right aur jab field team ki visiting hoti thi currently sir dheere dheere jo data hai na wo completely centralized hota ja raha hai aur ab jo sir ye hai ki aapko jo bhi assistant sir diya jata hai head office se Noida head office se hi aapko connect kiya jata hai sir aap check karenge aapke product line mein jitni bhi company hai aapke nahi all over India currently the all services are provided by your account manager aapke account manager ke through saari services sir provide hota hai aur wo sir hum aapko digitally hi sir without visit hi hum aapko guide kar paate hai.
Customer: Wahi main bata raha hu aapko digitally aap jo bolte ho na usme hota kya hai ek to aapka time aur hamara time match nahi ho pata hai aur jab bhi hum log karne baithte hai wo possible nahi hota hai isliye main bol raha hu ki samne agar banda aayega na yaha pe personally to usko hum log samjha sakte hai wo humko samjha sakta hai hum us hisab se.
Executive: Sir sir jaise ki aap call pe jo aap samajhna chah rahe hai na jaise aapko jo person call pe jo bata raha hai to aap video meeting pe sir join kar dijiye na sir saari cheeze guide ho jayegi.
Customer: Lekin lekin aapko yaha pe local banda dene mein problem kya hai.
Executive: Sir nahi availability hai isiliye sir main nahi provide kar pa raha hu sir otherwise main kyu nahi provide karta apne client ko currently jo possible hi nahi hai sir to sir main wo kaise kar pata hu sir.
Customer: Nahi sir nahi hai kya hai abhi aapna hai na renewal condition mein hai aur hum log aage na ye soch rahe agar ye is type ka agar rahega service to itna kharcha karne ke bawajud agar hame proper service nahi mil payegi to matlab nahi hai na ye portal chalu rakh ke usse achcha mere ko fir wo Trade India wala bhi achcha service aur achcha package bhi de raha hai mujhe to hum log udhar koshish karenge shift kar lenge apna account.
Executive: Sir dekhiye sir dekhiye aur jo abhi field visiting hai sir is time pe sir possible nahi hai aur service ki baat hai to aapko sir ek proper account manager milta hai main aapke account manager ka manager baat kar raha hu in case agar unse issue resolve nahi ho raha hai to sir aap mere sath 15 minute baithiye aapka jo bhi issue hai to finally sir IndiaMART ki use aap hi ko karna hai sir right jo bhi changment karna hai main live baith ke sir yahi se aapki saari change sir kar sakta hu sir usme koi usme koi aapko dikkat nahi aayegi sir.
Customer: Nahi nahi main kya bol raha hu aapki baat bilkul sahi hai lekin kehna ek hi hai ki aap local koi to banda do na jisse hame kaam aasan ho jaye hamara thoda sa.
Executive: Sir agar dekhiye local banda to sir kyuki aapka account sir abhi head office mein hai Noida right to waha pe sir hum local aapko provide nahi kar pa rahe hai sir pehla cheez dusra cheez sir ye hai ki jo aapka person agar aap keh rahe hai to aapko jo problem hai aapko uska resolution hi na chahiye sir wo main resolution aapko properly yaha se bhi provide kar sakta hu main aapki saari resolution sir yaha se sir sort out ho sakti hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Sir use aap meri baat samjhiye sir abhi do minute mujhe sir dijiye dekhiye use sir aap hi ko karna hai IndiaMART sir jo lead collect hai aapke catalog ka update karna hai ya jo bhi aapke product line mein change karne hai aapko sir main as a senior manager yaha se saari cheeze sir resolve kar sakta hu live aapka jo person jayega.
Customer: Aapka hota kya hai na aapka hota kya hai abhi ek do log hum log abhi isme teen char log rehte hai aap mere se phone pe baat karoge main main jagah pe rahu na rahu usme hota kya hai ki wo mujhe time nahi mila to apna us din to nikal gaya baki lekin aapka agar local banda koi rahega to mere yaha pe teen char jo bhi hum log yaha pe hai operating point of view mere yaha pe jaise mere office mein aur do logo ke account mein agar deke rakhu to kam se kam unse baat hoke unse wo to resolve ho sakte hai na problem.
Executive: Ab sir dekhiye agar ye keh rahe hai ki aapke pass availability nahi hai jaise office mein teen char log hai koi.
Customer: Bahut saari bahut baar isse pehle kaun tha abhi malum nahi hai abhi aapka shubh naam.
Executive: Abhimanyu Singh baat kar raha hu sir senior manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Yahi hota hai sir kya hota hai na isse pehle jo baat hoti thi na to isme kya hota hai ki main jagah pe jana chahiye mere samne wo account open karke uske baad fir mera jo bhi account hai wo start karke usme koi changes hai aap bataenge fir main karunga lekin next day mein agar mujhe kuch hota hai ya aur kuch cheeze chahiye immediately ya hafte mein kuch hota hai to uske liye mujhe agar local banda mil jata hai na to mera koi bhi banda yaha se phone karke fatafat usko resolve karke clear kar lega aur wo bhi aake aapka banda humko samne samne baith ke bata dega ek baar to wo proper clear ho jata hai aap mujhe bataoge fir mujhe time hona chahiye hum log kya ek to field mein rehte hai field mein main mera boss bhi kabhi jagah pe hote nahi hote to baki other jo log baithe hai na un logo ke hisab se bhi agar koi na koi ye account kya hota hai hum log saal bhar ka itna kharcha karte hai aur wo proper dhang se agar operate nahi hota isse pehle hota tha na yaar Nasik se aate the na aapke bande actually ye chalu hua hi Nasik se.
Executive: Bilkul sir IndiaMART pe nine years ho gaye sir aapko IndiaMART mein main samajh raha hu aapki baat.
Customer: I know sir ye chalu hua local level se hi chalu hua hai uske baad fir ye dheere dheere north mein shift ho gaye aapke yaha pe lekin mera kehna yahi hai ki abhi aap mere ko na local onboard yaha pe service provide karo initially fir dekh ke main batau ek baar mera account thik se chalne laga na fir mere ko jarurat nahi padegi.
Executive: Main aapki baat sir samajh gaya ki aap jo initial maang rahe hai na ki ek field visit person aapke yaha chahiye right but currently sir wo possible.
Customer: Field mein ek do din baar to mahine mein ek do baar humko aake samjha dega na ek baar ye chalu ho gaya na achche se fir mujhe wo problem nahi rahegi main ya mera.
Executive: Achcha usko main dikkat sir kya aa rahi hai sir aapko main dikkat sir kya aa rahi hai aap ye bataenge.
Customer: Kya hota hai dekhiye buyleads hote hai aapke yaha pe hamare yaha pe consume nahi ho jate abhi hum log kabhi consume karne gaye to saale samne samajh mein aata hai ki already kisi ne le liya hai char panch logo ne le liya aur kai jagah se to mere ko aise bhi dikhta nahi hai baad mein aise bahut saari cheeze bahut saari dikkate hai ki wo har cheeze aapko update nahi hoti yaar update aap utna time bhi nahi hai ki bhai particular ye leke aapko baat kare yahi main bata raha hu ki aapka kaisa hai banda samne aayega na to fatafat fatafat samne samne bhai kya screen pe.
Executive: Dekhiye sir agar koi aapko field service mein agar dekhiye to abhi currently possible nahi hai main ek baar baat kar leta hu but dusra cheez main ye bhi bata du ki agar aapka correction sab kuch done bhi ho jaye na buylead ka jo consumption jo aapko dikh raha hai na ki sir wo aapko nahi mil pa raha hai first come first serve basis pe hota hai sir ek buyer ko jo requirement jata hai aapki taraf paanch supplier connect karte hai sirf paanch jaise hi fifth number ka supplier connect karega wo lead ho jayegi purchase yani sold out ho jayegi to waha pe sir jo IndiaMART ka koi bhi aapka person chahe aap use kar rahe ho aapke boss use kar rahe ho ya koi aapka aur colleague use kar raha ho use proper active rehna padega sir agar wo proper active nahi rahega na sir to wo kisi kaam ka nahi hai sir right aapko active IndiaMART mein rehna padega main aapki dekhiye main bhi wahi sir keh raha hu jo aap keh rahe hai bas aapka ye concern hai ki aapko field visit chahiye lekin buylead ka consumption aap hi ko karna hai.
Customer: Main kya bol raha hu wo karenge hum log lekin field visit pe aake na mere yaha pe ek do logo ko agar bata dega na to koi ek bande ko main baad mein bolke ye tera kaam hai sir aake itna kam se kam at least ye dekh lena to wo chalu kar dega to usme se mera kaam start ho jayegi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mera ek baar wo line karwa do baad mein dekhte hai na fir hum log aapko kaha shift karna hai wo dekhenge fir kaise karna hai usko initially mujhe ye setting mujhe initially ye setting to karwa ke do mere ko kam se kam local service to provide karo kuch to.
Executive: Sir of course sir agar possible hota to main aapke call pe hi sir aapko of course field person aapko assign kar deta.
Customer: Aapka Nasik office mein mere ko ek cheez bolo aapka Nasik mein office hai ki nahi jisse hum logo ne start kiya tha hamara aapka Nasik office hai ki nahi to Nasik mere local office mein se kisi ko to bhejo mere area mein kya hota hai main baitha hu ek jile mein ek state ke ek jile mein baitha hu jile mein mujhe bahut saari restrictions hoti hai usi hisab se mujhe agar agar aapka Delhi ka koi banda aayega aur mere ko bolega ek cheez mere ko de to main nahi de paunga mera business aisa nahi hai ki all over pan India mein hum log bech paye agar aisa rehta to mujhe koi jarurat hi nahi thi paise to kahi bhi kidhar se bhi business kar sakta tha lekin mujhe mere area ke hisab se mere aas pass ke area ke hisab se usme se main kya chun sakta hu kya le sakta hu kya lena chahiye wo aapka aadmi mere ko bata dega ki bhai ye ye ye aap career lagaao ye is tarah se hoga itna itna hai aapka ye area ke hisab se ye bounding rahega aap isme business karo aur ye proper business aapko ye focus yaha pe karna chahiye ye hona chahiye catalog aise update hona ye saari cheeze ek baar ho gayi hamari uske baad fir baad mein hum log kya hota hai aap mujhe bataoge 15 minute aadha ghanta mere se phone pe baat karoge uske baad aap nikal jate ho main bhi mere kaam mein lag jata hu main kya bolta hu suniye na aapka banda agar aata hai na local mein to at least uske sath mein koi baithega to mera baki sara koi to karega kuch to kisi ko bol dunga bhai wo aane wale tum baitho uske sath mein samne samajhne se jaise baju mein baith ke samjha lete to samajh mein aata hai fatafat aur ek baar wo samajh mein aa gaya na to hame bhi sikha dega to hum log bhi kar payenge.
Executive: Actually sir kya hai ki pehle jo aapke yaha visiting hota tha main aapki baat agree kar raha hu but currently jo hai na aapko saari service live video meeting ke connect ke through di jati hai sir right ab waha pe ye hota hai ki aap kya aapke sath agar char bande agar aapke waha pe jo hai aapke pura agar team bhi baith jati hai to hum puri team ko sir ek sath hi guide kar paate hai aur wo pura live dekhte hai ki kaha se kya karna hai isliye kyuki sir agar possible ho ji dekhiye maine meri baat rakh di hai abhi aage aapko sochna hai kya karna hai kya nahi karna hai maine mera jo concern tha maine bata diya aapko uske upar abhi aap sochiye aur baad mein mujhe bataiye nahi to waise bhi main bola maine aapko ki mere pass Trade India wale aane wale hai wo log sab mere ko ye saari cheeze dene wale hai to main shayad aage udhar unke sath mein jud jaao.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART jaisa service sir aapko koi nahi deta sir aapko lag raha hai aap ek baar join kijiye sir.
Customer: Aap jo bol rahe ho na wo service nahi mil raha hai mujhe main bataya abhi dekhiye mera concern to maine bol diya hai abhi aap bataiye aap upar baat kar lijiye uske baad mujhe jo bhi.
Executive: Main ek baar baat kar leta hu sir ki agar possible hoga to wo jo main aapko update kar deta hu okay sure sir okay.
Customer: Okay thank you bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants local onboard virtual representative.

- Portal utilization not happening properly.

- Wants field visit for better understanding.

- Considering shifting to Trade India due to service issues.

- Facing issues with buylead consumption.



Resolution:

- Executive explained data is getting centralized.

- Executive mentioned all services provided by account manager.

- Suggested joining video meeting for guidance.

- Executive offered to resolve issues in 15 minutes.

- Executive explained buylead consumption process.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check possibility of field visit.



Alert (If Any):

Risk of churn

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, buyleads, account manager, renewal, service
